author: Ben Pringle
title: Premier League Player of the Month: Which star has won most awards? | Football | Sport | Express.co.uk
text:
1 of 41 Who has won the most Premier League Player of the Month awards? 
Nigerian striker Odemwingie hit a rich vein of form during his stay at The Hawthorns, meaning he has more Premier League Player of the Month awards than Diego Costa, Ryan Giggs and Luis Suarez to name a few... 
Manchester United rule the roost when it comes to sheer violume of monthly accolades picked up since 1994, but which individual has earned the most in the trophy's history? 
Scroll through the gallery above to see which Premier League star has won the most Player of the Month awards ever. Related articles
